title: The Bride’s Measure
description: Whisperfen does not decide between steam and frost, so it keeps both. Reed-specters comb the fog and return with bits of voices they sell to hungry pools. Yevra Ashleaf meets you under a bell stake, eyes ringed with smokeherb silver. The Bride of Mist waits where three plumes cross, and she demands tender coin: the memory of something that makes you yourself. She will trade you a path by sound to anywhere you know, but the path collapses if you speak a true name. You have already paid her once in secret. Now, you must bring her a memory you can spare and ask for a route that turns the city inside out, so you can enter the Wound without drawing the Emberwatch’s gaze. The bog gurgles as if laughing at your balance.
objectives: Meet Yevra Ashleaf at the Whisperfen bell stakes and receive ritual guidance for avoiding true names.
Gather a sprig of smokeherb with silver veins as an offering and place it at the crossing of three plumes.
Trade a lesser memory to the Bride of Mist in exchange for a breath-path to Aelmyr’s Wound that masks your heat-signature.
Use the Vent-Pearl Pair to store the path’s breath and avoid voice-thief specters.
Return with a sealed whisper describing the path without speaking it.

dialogue.speaker: Yevra Ashleaf
dialogue.text: The Bride does not take what you think she will. She takes what the fog wants to keep warm. Choose a memory that will not collapse you, and remember that saying your own true name is a kind of surrender here. Walk with your breath as your only bell.

dialogue.speaker: Bride of Mist
dialogue.text: Come closer, warm one. I can smell the fire under your tongue. You have given me a face before, and I have kept it safe where the air does not forget. Give me a different sweetness. Give me the taste of a first success, perhaps, or the sound of a promise that you almost broke and did not. In return, I will stitch you a quiet between law and legend.

dialogue.speaker: Neris Coilglass
dialogue.text: Take the sound of a day when a gyre balanced for the first time under my hand and I was alone and triumphant. I have others to borrow triumph from now. I need a path that holds its breath when watchmen pass.

dialogue.speaker: Yevra Ashleaf
dialogue.text: Do not uncork the whisper until you are ready to walk it. And when you do, breathe with it, not through it. Paths like this go sour when rushed.

rewards: Sealed breath-path whisper to Aelmyr’s Wound
Vent-Pearl Pair attuned to path-breath (stores one song-breath per pearl)
A lesser memory surrendered to the Bride of Mist
